tweets.text:
An oil & gas company in Alaska has shut down two of its offshore drilling operations because of, you guessed it, another natural gas leak. 

This is the same company responsible for a 2017 leak that released 310,000 cubic ft of natural gas a day. https://t.co/hGLJ3o69pG

Day 2 in the ‚Äòfallout‚Äô room HELP! @EnvAgency & @PHE_uk the @RedIndustries2 Walleys landfill stench attack is everywhere. How many complaints now? @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @AaronBell4NUL @NewsNBC see advice for casualties @StinkStopthe #stopthestink https://t.co/MIwl9I26Qe
